description: This file defines several reusable Flutter widgets for a music streaming app, including a gradient header, a track list tile, and an album card, each designed for displaying music-related information with consistent styling.

classes.name: GradientHeader
classes.description: A decorative gradient header with a title and optional trailing widget.

classes.name: TrackListTile
classes.description: A styled list tile for displaying track information with optional tap callback and custom leading widget.

classes.name: AlbumCard
classes.description: A compact card widget representing an album or artwork, with tap interaction.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for each of the three widget classes.
